name: adjunct_tort_plot_dp_align
author: PA Taylor (NIMH, NIH, USA)
description: Tool to display the rigid-body alignment parameters from TORTOISE's DIFFPREP, useful for analyzing subject motion in DWI data.

inputs.name: DIFFPREP Transform File
inputs.description: Name of DIFFPREP-produced file to parse, probably ending in '_transformations.txt'.

inputs.name: Output Prefix
inputs.description: Base of output files; can contain path information. Should *not* include any extension.

inputs.name: Enorm Max Value
inputs.description: Specify max value of y-axis of enorm plot in SVG image. Useful for having a constant value across a study.

inputs.name: Enorm Horizontal Line Value
inputs.description: Specify value of a horizontal, dotted, bright cyan line for the enorm plot in SVG image. Can help with visualization.

inputs.name: Disable SVG Plot
inputs.description: Opt to turn off even checking to plot an SVG version of the figure.

output-files.name: Alignment Parameters File
output-files.description: Text file containing 6 columns of data for the rigid-body alignment parameters estimated by DIFFPREP.

output-files.name: Enorm File
output-files.description: Text file with 1 column of data, the Euclidean norm of the differences of the rigid body alignment parameters.

output-files.name: Plot Image (JPG)
output-files.description: A plot of enorm and the alignment parameters in JPG format.

output-files.name: Plot Image (SVG)
output-files.description: A plot of enorm and the alignment parameters in SVG format.
